Class DependantProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.tools.gradle.project.DependantProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dependant

    public final class DependantProject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dependant
    A Dependant implemented on top of a DependencyHandler of a project.
